body_html:
Well, if you're going to do numpy-style broadcasting, shouldn't you use their rules? They're well-specified.

Actually supporting numpy-style broadcast across all torch pointwise operations seems like a big API change though and a bunch of work, worth thinking through if this is a good idea.

Actually supporting numpy-style broadcast across all torch pointwise operations seems like a big API change though and a bunch of work, worth thinking through if this is a good idea.
body:
Well, if you're going to do numpy-style broadcasting, shouldn't you use their rules? They're well-specified.

Actually supporting numpy-style broadcast across all torch pointwise operations seems like a big API change though and a bunch of work, worth thinking through if this is a good idea.
